remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些属性对象表示特征的计算机上运行的打印队列实用工具，但其他人表示功能或打印机本身的状态。Some properties of the object represent characteristics of the print queue utility that runs on the computer, but others represent features or states of the printer itself. 例如，是打印队列的特征，但是打印机的属性。For example, is a characteristic of the print queue, but is a property of the printer. 许多打印机，如是否需要用户关注的属性需要的方式通过传递方法，从打印机本身为对象。Many of the properties of the printer, such as whether it needs user attention, need to be passed, by means of the method, from the printer itself to the object. 应执行此操作之前的相应属性 () 读取由你的程序。This should be done before the corresponding property () is read by your program. 同样，更改时您的程序的一个或多个属性的值对象，必须将更改写入的实际打印队列实用工具的计算机上。Similarly, when your program changes the values of one or more properties of a object, the change must be written to the actual print queue utility on the computer. 这样做的方法。Do this with the method. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用在这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将设备特定信息写入假脱机文件，该情况下不会自动包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]后台处理程序。Use this method to write device specific information, to a spool file, that is not automatically included by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] spooler. 当然，您需要知道后台打印文件是否[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]。Of course, you need to know whether the spool file is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]. 如果你希望 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，可以使用类而不是此方法。If you prefer to work with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], you can use the class instead of this method. 之后已调用方法，您必须编写到数组的属性返回的或创建任何打印作业。After the method has been called, you must write a array to the property of the that is returned by or no print job is created. 此数组是如果打印机正常工作，而不暂停打印内容。This array is what prints if the printer is working and is not paused. > [!CAUTION] > 如果未关闭与中的线程结束之前调用，则由于后台处理程序线程不能通过获得控制该线程终止时，将引发对象。If the is not closed with before the end of the thread in which is called, then an is thrown when that thread ends because the spooler thread cannot gain control over the object. 打印队列中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，作业具有名称"打印系统文档"。In the print queue's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)], the job has the name "Print System Document". 若要为作业指定不同的名称，使用重载。To give the job a different name, use the overload. 打印中的其他方法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包括方法，可以在有或无需打开对话框，而多并方法的。Other ways to print in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] include the method, which can be used with or without opening the dialog, and the many and methods of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用发送阵列分区到打印队列。The following example shows how to use to send a array to a print queue. 此代码仅适用于打印机可以检测和打印纯文本。This code only works with printers that can detect and print plain text. 其中一些不能。Some of them cannot. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fastCopy`是`true`，则必须为打印机[打印概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/printing-overview.md)。If `fastCopy` is `true`, then the printer must be an [Printing Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/printing-overview.md). 如果不是，方法将引发异常。If it is not, the method throws an exception. 如果`fastCopy`是`false`，则不需要使用 XPSDrv 打印机。If `fastCopy` is `false`, then it is not necessary to use an XPSDrv printer. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]添加到队列的文件转换为打印机的页面描述语言，如 PCL 和 Postscript。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] file being added to the queue is converted to the printer's page description language, such as PCL or Postscript. 但是，这种类型的打印将调用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_com](~/includes/tlasharptla-com-md.md)]。However, this kind of printing makes a call to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_com](~/includes/tlasharptla-com-md.md)]. 在调用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)]要求调用线程具有一个单线程单元 () 而不是多线程单元 () 中的默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]2.0 及更高版本。The call to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] requires that the calling thread have a single-threaded apartment () instead of multiple-threaded apartment () which is the default in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] 2.0 and later. (有关线程和单元状态的详细信息，请参阅[托管和非托管线程处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5)，和。)有两种方法执行此操作的：(For more on threading and apartment states, see [Managed and Unmanaged Threading](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db425c20-4b2f-4433-bf96-76071c7881e5), and .) There are two ways of doing this: - 最简单方法是添加(即，"`[System.STAThreadAttribute()]`") 的应用程序的第一行的正上方`Main`方法 (通常"`static void Main(string[] args)`")。The simplest way is to add the (that is, "`[System.STAThreadAttribute()]`") just above the first line of the application's `Main` method (usually "`static void Main(string[] args)`"). - 如果您需要你`Main`线程的单元状态为，可以容纳对调用在单独的线程的单元状态设置为与。If you need your `Main` thread's apartment state to be , you can house the call to in a separate thread whose apartment state is set to with . 下面的示例演示此第二个方法。The example below illustrates this second technique. > [!NOTE] > 无法应用到任何方法，但`Main`也不能使用为`Main`线程。You cannot apply the to any method except `Main` and you cannot use for the `Main` thread. 打印中的其他方法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]包括方法，可以在有或无需打开对话框，而多并方法的。Other ways to print in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] include the method, which can be used with or without opening the dialog, and the many and methods of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用进行批处理打印全部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]目录中的文件。The following example shows how to use to batch print all the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] files in a directory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多打印机需要花费高达英寸空白边缘周围的每一页纸的每个季度和浏览打印机。Many printers need up to a quarter of an inch of unprinted space around the edges of each page to grip the paper and move it through the printer. 否则墨粉会污染纸张流机制。Otherwise toner would foul the paper flow mechanism. 可打印的区域是"成像区域"。The area which can be printed is the "imageable area." 类型没有公共构造函数。The type has no public constructor. 因此，变量`documentImageableArea`必须声明和分配给`null`和只能将其传递给方法。Hence, the variable `documentImageableArea` must be declared and assigned to `null` and only then passed to the method. 此方法显示需要来自用户的输入。This method displays a requiring input from the user. 用户选择打印机、 纸张大小和方向并关闭对话框后`documentImageableArea`初始化到实际对象及其属性的点。After the user has selected a printer, paper size, and orientation and closed the dialog, `documentImageableArea` points to an actual object and its properties are initialized. 如果用户取消或关闭对话框，返回值是`null`。If the user cancels or closes the dialog, the return value is `null`. 因此，必须检查返回值`null`通过你的应用程序。As a consequence, the return value must be checked for `null` by your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多打印机需要花费高达英寸空白边缘周围的每一页纸的每个季度和浏览打印机。Many printers need up to a quarter of an inch of unprinted space around the edges of each page to grip the paper and move it through the printer. 否则墨粉会污染纸张流机制。Otherwise toner would foul the paper flow mechanism. 可打印的区域是"成像区域"。The area which can be printed is the "imageable area." 类型没有公共构造函数。The type has no public constructor. 因此，变量`documentImageableArea`必须声明和分配给`null`和只能将其传递给方法。Hence, the variable `documentImageableArea` must be declared and assigned to `null` and only then passed to the method. 此方法显示需要来自用户的输入。This method displays a requiring input from the user. 用户 （包括选择打印机、 纸张大小、 方向和页面范围） 对话框上配置其打印作业。The user configures his print job on the dialog (including selecting a printer, paper size, orientation, and page range). 关闭此对话框，`pageRangeSelection`并`pageRange`具有值，和`documentImageableArea`指向实际对象初始化其属性。When the dialog is closed, `pageRangeSelection` and `pageRange` have values, and `documentImageableArea` points to an actual object whose properties are initialized. 如果用户取消或关闭对话框，返回值是`null`。If the user cancels or closes the dialog, the return value is `null`. 因此，必须检查返回值`null`通过你的应用程序。As a consequence, the return value must be checked for `null` by your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数用作的基础构造对象。The parameter is used as the basis on which to construct the object. 例如，假设打印机支持仅介质类型 A 和 B 从输入 bin 1 并且它仅支持从送纸器 2 的媒体类型 C。For example, suppose the printer supported only media types A and B from input bin 1 and it only supported media type C from input bin 2. 如果`printTicket`参数指定送纸器 1，则返回的对象将包括所有三个介质类型，但它将报告类型 C 作为"限制"。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 1, then the object that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report type C as "constrained." 如果`printTicket`参数指定送纸器 2，则返回的对象将包括所有三个介质类型，但它将报告类型 A 和 B，如"限制"。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 2, then the object that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report types A and B as "constrained." 请参阅[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)有关约束的详细信息。See the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) for more information on constraints. 如果`printTicket`是`null`，则使用。If `printTicket` is `null`, the is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数用作用于构造 XML 的打印功能的基础。The parameter is used as the basis on which to construct the print capabilities XML. 例如，假设打印机支持仅介质类型 A 和 B 从输入 bin 1 并且它仅支持从送纸器 2 的媒体类型 C。For example, suppose the printer supported only media types A and B from input bin 1 and it only supported media type C from input bin 2. 如果`printTicket`参数指定送纸器 1，则返回的 XML 的打印功能将包括所有三个介质类型，但它将报告类型 C 作为"限制"。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 1, then the print capabilities XML that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report type C as "constrained." 如果`printTicket`参数指定送纸器 2，则返回的 XML 的打印功能将包括所有三个介质类型，但它将报告类型 A 和 B，如"限制"。If the `printTicket` parameter specified input bin 2, then the print capabilities XML that is returned would include all three media types, but it would report types A and B as "constrained." 请参阅[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)有关约束的详细信息。See the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) for more information on constraints. 如果`printTicket`是`null`，则使用。If `printTicket` is `null`, the is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法可生成可行的打印票证;也就是说，不会请求打印功能的票证打印机不支持。The method produces a viable print ticket; that is, a ticket that does not request printing features that the printer does not support. 该方法首先验证针对两个输入打印票证[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The method first validates the two input print tickets against the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 如果任一项无效，将引发异常。If either is invalid, an exception is thrown. 然后合并两种票证。The two tickets are then merged. 如果它们具有不同的特定属性值合并所得的票证最初使用增量票证的值。If they have different values for a particular property then the resulting merged ticket initially uses the value of the delta ticket. 根据打印机的实际功能然后检查合并的票证。The merged ticket is then checked against the actual capabilities of the printer. 如果有在票证中的设置不兼容的打印机的功能，则打印机驱动程序使用的任何逻辑而更改这些设置该公司需要。If any settings in the ticket are incompatible with the printer's capabilities, then the printer driver changes those settings by using whatever logic it wants. 通常情况下，都将替换设置的用户或打印机的默认值。Typically, it substitutes the user's or printer's default value for the setting. 其驱动程序的源的替换值不是作为同一个票证`basePrintTicket`，则合并的票证可能具有不同于这两个输入票证的某些设置。It the driver's source of substitute values is not the same ticket as `basePrintTicket`, then the merged ticket might have some settings that are different from both of the input tickets. 如果打印机驱动程序必须更改任何设置，则以报告这一事实属性的。If the printer driver has to change any settings then this fact is reported in the property of the . 根据打印队列的默认设置进行合并和验证，应设置`basePrintTicket`到或。To merge and validate based on a print queue’s default settings, you should set `basePrintTicket` to the or the . `deltaPrintTicket`参数可以是`null`，在这种情况下`basePrintTicket`验证，检查的可行性，并返回，可能更改。The `deltaPrintTicket` parameter can be `null`, in which case the `basePrintTicket` is validated, checked for viability, and returned, possibly with changes. 使用此重载，这两个`deltaPrintTicket`和中返回具有作业为作用域。With this overload of , both the `deltaPrintTicket` and the in the that is returned have job wide scope. 若要指定不同的作用域，请使用此方法的其他重载。To specify a different scope use the other overload of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来合并两种打印票证和响应返回。The following example shows how to use this method to merge two print tickets and respond to the that is returned. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

value.span: 使用首次安装打印机 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] 添加打印机向导中，打印机默认为可用的所有时间，并且此属性在所有时区返回 0。

span.span: When a printer is first installed by using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] Add Printer Wizard, the printer defaults to being available all the time, and this property returns 0 in all time zones.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不在 UTC 时区，必须添加或减去 60 来设置或获取有关您所在的时区正确的时间的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to set or get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区的并且夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间是比 UTC 早 8 小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 若要设置为您所在的时区中的 12 AM，您将其设置为上午 8 点 UTC，即的 480 （= 8 \* 60）。To set to 12 AM in your time zone, you set it to 8 AM UTC, which is 480 (= 8 \* 60). 您还必须记住的时间升级到零后 24 小时 (即; 1439 分后)。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after 24 hours (that is; after the 1439th minute). 若要将其设置为在您所在时区的下午 6 点，您将其设置为凌晨 2 点 UTC，这是的 120 （= 2 \* 60）。To set it to 6 PM in your time zone, you set it to 2 AM UTC, which is 120 (= 2 \* 60). 请参阅， ，和有用操作方法的时区的类。See , , and classes for helpful time zone manipulating methods. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对在所有时区返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定在存在时是否可用打印机。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether a printer is available at the present time. [!code-cpp[PrinterStatusSurvey#UsingStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrinterStatusSurvey/CPP/Program.cpp#usingstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-csharp[PrinterStatusSurvey#UsingStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrinterStatusSurvey/CSharp/Program.cs#usingstartanduntiltimes)] [!code-vb[PrinterStatusSurvey#UsingStartAndUntilTimes](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrinterStatusSurvey/visualbasic/program.vb#usingstartanduntiltimes)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不在 UTC 时区，必须添加或减去 60 来设置或获取有关您所在的时区正确的时间的倍数。If you are not in the UTC time zone, you must add or subtract multiples of 60 to set or get the correct time for your time zone. 例如，如果您处于北美太平洋时区的并且夏时制不起作用，则您的本地时间是比 UTC 早 8 小时。For example, if you are in the Pacific Time Zone of North America and daylight savings time is not in effect, then your local time is 8 hours earlier than UTC. 若要设置为您所在的时区中的 12 AM，您将其设置为上午 8 点 UTC，即的 480 （= 8 \* 60）。To set to 12 AM in your time zone, you set it to 8 AM UTC, which is 480 (= 8 \* 60). 您还必须记住该时间升级到零后 24 小时 （1439 分钟）。You also must remember that time rolls over to zero after the 24th hour (the 1439th minute). 若要将其设置为在您所在时区的下午 6 点，您将其设置为凌晨 2 点 UTC，这是的 120 （= 2 \* 60）。To set it to 6 PM in your time zone, you set it to 2 AM UTC, which is 120 (= 2 \* 60). 请参阅， ，和有用操作方法的时区的类。See , , and classes for helpful time zone manipulating methods. 如果打印机始终可用，此属性对在所有时区返回 0。If the printer is always available, then this property returns 0 in all time zones. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定在存在时是否可用打印机。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether a printer is available at the present time.
